QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Scorpions
QAPair.Answer: This article describes the effects of a scorpion sting. This article for information only. DO NOT use it to treat or manage a scorpion sting. If you or someone you are with is stung, call the local emergency number (such as 911), or the local poison control center can be reached directly by calling the national toll-free Poison Help hotline (1-800-222-1222) from anywhere in the United States.
